page.title: 20CORPORAL R.A.F. WADDINGTON
page.content: The Corporal is married to an R.A.F. ex-serviceman and they live at Bracebridge, near to lower Waddington. Fortunately she does not have to work shifts and so she can start work at 8.30am and finish at 5.00pm. The Corporal's day begins at 7.15am and she manages an hour for lunch. She used to work as an air traffic controller but now is in flight planning; providing routes, weather conditions, take off and landing times and arranging accomodation and meals for incoming air crew. After work the Corporal has tea and then enjoys gardening or watching T.V. She goes to bed around 10.00pm. -------------------------------------- This information on Waddington was compiled and written by Class 3, Lowfields Junior School, Lincoln. With help from the people of Waddington.
